turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What kind of cold coffee beverages does starbucks offer?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well, we have iced coffees which are just over ice, we have frappes that are blended coffee beverages, and we also offer the americano which has no cream or sugar in it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh Great to know. I'm kind of thinking a frappe today, what kind of flavors do you offer?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well, currently we have a seasonal drink. We have a cinnamon short-bread frappe as that drink, it's been selling well. We also have our basic flavors, mocha, caramel, java chip, and we can always add a flavor shot to any drink you'd like.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh great. The cinnamon short-bread frappe sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size can we get that for you in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What sizes do you offer?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We have tall as our smallest, grande, and venti as our biggest.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll go for the grande size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so a grande cinnamon short-bread, is there anything else I can get you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: could I also get a mocha frappe for my friend?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, definitely.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: She'd like a shot of peppermint added as well, grande too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, that's not a problem, it'll just be 30 cents extra.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is it possible to get that made with almond milk rather than whole?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah that'll just be 30 cents extra as well.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, no problem, yeah that'll be all for me today then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, that brings your total to $9.19.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, that's no problem, I'll be paying with cash today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so a ten dollar bill? 81 cents will be your change today.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thankyou.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem your drinks will be right up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I have both your drinks, is there anything I can get for you, a drink carrier?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thankyou, my friend's actually just waiting in the car. Have a nice day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You too! Thank you!
